content:
1.新建文档 新建 markdown文档 类型：blog/research/read/life
cd ~/Documents/myBlogs hugo new ports/blog/<article_name>.md 2. 写作 打开vsc进行md编辑，实时渲染。
也可以在用热键command+S保存后在bash中输入：
hugo server -D 在浏览器中打开 http://localhost:1313/ 即可在本地浏览博客生成情况
写作完毕后，记得添加tags方便查询与归档
3. 上传remote cd myBlogs hugo -F --cleanDestinationDir cd public git add . git commit -m "sth“ git push 文章会自动上传到 http://lysandert.github.io
summary: 1.新建文档 新建 markdown文档 类型：blog/research/read/life cd ~/Documents/myBlogs hugo new ports/blog/<article_name>.md 2. 写作 打开vsc进行md编辑，实时渲染。 也可以在用热键command+S保存后在bash中输入： hugo server -D 在浏览器中打开 http://localhost:1313/ 即可在本地浏览博客生成情况 写作完毕后，记得添加tags方便查询与
title: Blog Workflow

content:
basic initialize local repository
git init make untracked file tracked
git add [file] git add . # add all commit changes
git commit -m "message" view current information about git
git status remote repository set a new remote repo
git remote add origin [https or ssh] # origin is the default name of remote repo view current remote repo
git remote -v change url
git remote set-url [https or ssh] 拉取远程仓库
git pull git pull origin master >>> Already up to date. upload
git push -u origin master # first time git push origin master git push
summary: basic initialize local repository git init make untracked file tracked git add [file] git add . # add all commit changes git commit -m "message" view current information about git git status remote repository set a new remote repo git remote add origin [https or ssh] # origin is the default name of remote repo view current remote repo git remote -v change url git remote set-url [https or ssh] 拉取远程仓库 git pull git pull origin master >>> Already up to date. upload git push -u origin master # first time git push origin master git push
title: Git command
